dialogOption.texten: Yeah, I want the police please.
I've put some money in this vending machine and they're refusing to give me the money back.
I need that money to make an emergency call...
{HEAR MORE}You've called the police emergency line because you've put some money in a vending machine and it's not given it you back?
Yeah, they've not given it me at the hospital.
You'll have to come and sort it out.
{CONTACT SOMEONE ELSE}You need to contact the hospital - this is absolutely not a police emergency line issue.
You've put some money in a vending machine in the hospital...
(Cuts in) Yeah, they're not giving it me back, they're not, they're not giving it me back.
{MAKE POINT}You need to contact the vending machine company.
{HANG UP}I'm going to clear the line now because you're holding it up for people who have genuine emergencies.

reportElement.texten: The caller was using the emergency line for a vending machine problem.
